mapper.select: SELECT A.NT_NO, A.NT_TITLE, A.NT_CONTENT, A.USER_NO, A.NT_DATE, A.NT_ATTACH_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NT_NO DESC) AS RN, N.NT_NO, N.NT_TITLE, N.NT_CONTENT, N.NT_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH_NT ATC WHERE N.NT_NO = ATC.NT_NO) AS NT_ATTACH_COUNT, USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL, USR.NAME FROM NOTICE N LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T USR ON N.USER_NO = USR.USER_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT N.NT_NO, N.NT_TITLE, N.NT_CONTENTS, N.NT_DATE, , USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL, USR.NAME FROM USER_T USR RIGHT OUTER JOIN NOTICE N ON USR.USER_NO = N.USER_NO WHERE N.NT_NO = #{ntNo}
